title: I Am Banned From Chat Plz
body:
Guyz What Should i Do When Some One Starts Flaming Me ... ?
i am banned from chat for 25  games because of flaming some one who started flaming me first wtf is that 
in game 2 that caused me to get banned i was playing with singed {{champion:27}}  sup and vayne {{champion:67}}  adc in a ranked game and i was ekko {{champion:245}}  jg 
in min 3 singed died 2 fkin times and vayne died 1 time .... min fkin 3 ... and they starts to flame me rep jg and shit  
wtfffff is that .. so i started flaming too ... what should i do ?
and is there any way the 25 games chat ban could be removed ? thank you alot  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
> i am banned from chat for 25 games because of flaming some one who started flaming me first wtf is that

What kind of excuse is that? Pretty sure once you get out of Kindergarden this excuse stops working. Someone broke the rules so you can brake the rules aswell? Logic much?

> and is there any way the 25 games chat ban could be removed ?

Why? You broke the rules and got punished. Deal with it

you should just mute people.

see that "speaker" button next to their names when you press tab ? click that.

It's pretty hard not to defend your honor when someone starts flaming you, but in the long run retaliating is just as bad. A lot of people find it much more satisfying to play it cool and report them after the match. That way we'll get notified and can take action on behalf of everyone who's reported them.
